biotools.summary: PPCheck is a bioinformatics tool to identify protein-protein interactions, predict hotspots, perform compuational alanine scanning, predict native-like docking pose and calculate residue conservation for a protein.

bioschemas.name: PPCheck
bioschemas.summary: PPCheck is a bioinformatics tool to identify protein-protein interactions, predict hotspots, perform compuational alanine scanning, predict native-like docking pose and calculate residue conservation for a protein.
